text:
Hey team, looking to work with Sarah Chen for Big W. 
            Budget is approx $9,230 - need 3 x 30-second Instagram reel, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 3 x Facebook post, 1 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Twitter post. 3 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: September 2025.
